name: Heat Generator
description: Raises planetary temperature through controlled fusion reactions. Increases atmospheric retention but may evaporate water.

name: Cooling System
description: Reduces temperature using orbital solar shades and heat dispersal, encouraging water condensation.

name: Atmosphere Processor
description: Generates breathable atmosphere from planetary materials. Adds mass and shields against radiation.

name: Atmospheric Scrubber
description: Removes excess atmospheric gases through molecular filtration. Reduces radiation shielding.

name: Ocean Former
description: Terraforms land into ocean basins and manages water distribution. Promotes cooling.

name: Ice Comet Bombardment
description: Directs ice comets to increase planetary water content. Reduces temperature but adds vapor to the atmosphere.

name: Gravity Intensifier
description: Increases planetary mass through controlled matter compression, which helps retain atmosphere.

name: Gravity Stabilizer
description: Lowers gravity via mass redistribution. Reduces atmospheric density due to escape velocity effects.

name: Magnetic Field Generator
description: Creates protective magnetic field to deflect harmful radiation. Slightly increases atmospheric pressure.

name: Radiation Enhancer
description: Emits high-energy particles to simulate stellar radiation environments. Used to please exotic buyers or photosynthetic species.

name: Cloud Seeder
description: Injects condensation nuclei to form clouds. Adds water and reduces radiation via albedo effect.

name: Cryo-Atmos Converter
description: Extracts atmospheric gases from frozen sources. Adds atmosphere while cooling the planet.

name: Thermal Balancer
description: Smart thermal management system that adjusts between heating and cooling based on surrounding conditions. Side-effect neutral.

name: Bio-Seeder Pods
description: Deploys genetically tailored microbial and plant life. Boosts atmosphere and begins biosphere development.

name: Radiant Bloom
description: Spreads radiant-tolerant flora that thrive under moderate radiation and help stabilize biospheres.
